730910f-a.title: Bridges - Northern Boulevard Bridge - [Lawrence Street (West).]
730910f-a.text:
(1)
Northern Boulevard Bridge, west from Lawrence Street (over Flushing
Creek). This bridge is being made wider to take care of the tremendous
traffic leading to the Workd's Fair grounds.
June 16, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from another angle.
June 16, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
